column1: SELECT ad.InventoryYear, ad.IPCCSectoral as code, ad.EmissionYear as emissionYear, 'Activity Data' as PollutantName, 'AD' as PollutantID,

column3: s.SourceID, s.Source as SourceName, a.ActivityID, a.Activity as ActivityName, ad.ActivityUnits as Unit, SUM(ad.Activity) as Emission
FROM ActivitiesData as ad, IPCCSectoral ip, Source s,Activity a
GROUP BY ad.InventoryYear, ad.IPCCSectoral, ad.EmissionYear, s.SourceID, s.Source, a.ActivityID
